title: Episode 40: Silver and Gold
description: The rush of victory or crush of defeat in the Olympics can flash by very quickly. But if you slow those moments down, there's a lot to learn about human behavior.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: The rush of victory or crush of defeat in the Olympics can flash by very quickly. But if you slow those moments down, there's a lot to learn about human behavior.
